flawed_nl_solution:
Mr. Salazar had 7 x 12 = <<7*12=48>>48 oranges.
He reserved 48 x 1/4 = <<48*1/4=12>>12 oranges for his friend.
Ha had 48 - 12 = <<48-12=36>>36 oranges to be sold yesterday.
But only 36 x 3/7 = <<36*3/7=108/7>>108/7 oranges were sold yesterday.
So, he had 36 - 108/7 = <<36-108/7=144/7>>144/7 oranges left.
Since four oranges are rotten, then only 144/7 - 4 = <<144/7-4=116/7>>116/7 oranges are left to be sold today.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 84, not 48. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
